here is a recent research paper on #chloroquine for #rheumatology.  discussion of multiple possible #immunomodulatory mechanisms:

▶️ cytokine inhibition
▶️ inhibits CD154 expression
▶️ +

every paper I have seen though has a *requires more research* vibe
